titles.title: By Christ redeemed, in Christ restored

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}By Christ redeemed, in Christ restored, We keep the memory adored, And show the death of our dear Lord Until He come.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His body given in our stead Is seen in this memorial bread, And so our feeble love is fed Until He come.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Until the trump of God be heard, Until the ancient graves be stirred, And with the great commanding word The Lord shall come.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
